content: https://github.com/hl7/?q=Jira doesn't turn up the repo @Lloyd McKenzie showed just now with jira function (inBallot()) examples. Am I looking in the wrong place?

Ah, yes. That one isn't in Github. We're using BitBucket because Joshua convinced me that was a better place for the Jira stuff, though to be totally honest, I'm not sure that really holds. It might have been because it contains a lot of code that perhaps shouldn't be public. @Joshua Procious, can you give Josh read-access?

@Josh Mandel you have read access now to the repo here: https://bitbucket.hl7.org/projects/JIR/repos/jira-maintenance/browse "inballot()" is in there. Let me know if you have any questions sir. @Lloyd McKenzie if you feel github is better the switch can definitely be made.
Thanks! Generally would love to make this stuff public.
I'll let you wade through what's there and you can see if you think there's any reason it shouldn't be public.
